name: Assets added vs disposed
query:
SELECT
    DATE_FORMAT(a.reporting_month, "%%b-%%Y") AS period,
    SUM(CASE WHEN a.purchase_date IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS added_count,
    SUM(CASE WHEN a.status IN ('Sold', 'Scrapped') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS disposed_count
FROM (
    SELECT 
        name,
        purchase_date,
        disposal_date,
        status,
        DATE_FORMAT(COALESCE(purchase_date, disposal_date), "%%Y-%%m-01") AS reporting_month
    FROM 
        `tabAsset`
    WHERE
        (purchase_date IS NOT NULL OR (status IN ('Sold', 'Scrapped') AND disposal_date IS NOT NULL))
        AND company = %(company)s
        AND location = %(location)s
) a
GROUP BY 
    reporting_month
ORDER BY 
    STR_TO_DATE(period, "%%b-%%Y");
